name: Fix Fixer - Prototype
description:
This game (prototype) was developed for My First Game Jam: Summer 2022 by Team J-Rex

Jam theme is: Heal Story

Fix Fixer’s descendants are fixer by blood and still believes in God of Repair, and his family has a magical gift from the god, Item Healer Hammer. One day he decides on taking over family job and starts working as a repair man.

Team

Can ALTAY (Programmer, Unity3D)
Emre KİŞİOĞLU (Game Designer, 3D Generalist, UI Designer)
Lukas ŞARKLI (Concept, 2D, Key Visual Artist)

Controls

Walk "WASD", 
Jump "Space",
Inventory "1-2-3-4-5",
Interact “F”,
Throw “Q”,
Throw Hammer Around “Left Click”.

(All assets used in the production of the game were designed by us during the GameJam period, only the sound files were taken from Creative Commons-tagged videos on Youtube.)
